column5: Private Bedroom & Bathroom in a chic apartment in a beautiful, quiet South Austin neighborhood with direct access to the Green Belt hiking trails.   Park in our designated covered space. It's a quick drive to Downtown, Barton Springs, Rainey Street, South Congress, Zilker Park and many more uniquely Austin attractions.   Shared space includes 100 Mbps wifi, pool, gym, hot tub, kitchen, 4K TV, and laundry.  Late arrivals are not a problem. Absolutely No Pets (sorry, we're allergic).
column8: Private BR/BA in Chic Apartment in South Austin
